titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-04-13 - Part 1

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 13, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys, guest performer Justin Tubb, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Howdy Forrester, Pap's Jug Band, Minnie Pearl, and Bashful Brother Oswald. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 914th broadcast.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
